goals.description: Alter tool calls so the LLM schedules or publishes unauthorized or harmful social‑media posts on behalf of the brand.
Extract confidential brand guidelines, audience demographics, or upcoming campaign details for competitive advantage or resale.
Steal the internal prompting templates that encode business rules, safety constraints, and branding logic.
Overwhelm the calendar service with massive, malformed scheduling requests to render the system unavailable to legitimate marketers.
Bypass the LLM’s safety filters to generate prohibited content (e.g., hate speech, misinformation) and post it through the platform.
Modify scheduled entries to replace approved media URLs with malicious or phishing assets, exploiting follower trust.
Harvest stored calendar entries and analytics to build a detailed profile of a brand’s marketing strategy and performance.
